title: Nossa Senhora das Mercês (Chapel of)
body: Captain Gaspar Homem de El-Rei and his wife D. Isabel Florença founded a chapel dedicated to Nossa Senhora das Mercês in the parish of Arco da Calheta in the year 1650, which was located in a place called Florenças.

Florenças: Located in the parish of Arco da Calheta, in a place called Florenças.

Gaspar Homem de El-Rei: Founder of the chapel in 1650, along with his wife D. Isabel Florença.
